title: Mock Post from Local JSON
body: This data is being loaded from a local assets/posts.json file, not from the internet. It's perfect for UI development before the API is ready.

title: Offline Development is Easy
body: By using a mock repository, we can build and test the entire application without needing an active internet connection.

title: Flutter and JSON
body: Flutter makes it easy to work with JSON data, allowing for quick prototyping and development.
